comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Bummer about your wheels, Steve. I know how manly it feels scooter-pushing your bike down the road. Remember the time I went to Jamestown like that? When my frame broke? And everyone in town was pointing and snickering when I pulled into the Merc? And I walked funny - okay, _funnier_ - for a day? Yesterday was much better for cycling; it was dry. I don't want to drown out there today, so I'm hitting the stairs in Duane. Ugh. DU
